content: *crochet a masterpiece using floral-like motifs this pattern shows off the multi-colors of homespun that changes shades as you work lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 10458 corrections applied jul 19 2005 skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 6 colors 11 balls total crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge rounds 1-3 = 3 7 6 cm completed square = 8¼ 21 cm work 35 squares when all squares are joined work border similar patterns in other lion brand yarns 60215ad circle in a square afghan 2 wool-ease 70641ad circle in the square afghan 1 vanna s choice 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/circle-in-the-square-afghan-70641ad 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/circle-in-a-square-afghan-60215ad
